recipe.name: 5-minute Chocolate Cake
recipe.author: scoochmaroo
recipe.introduction: A quick and easy chocolate cake you can make in just 5 minutes! After experimenting with several variations, this version delivers a rich, moist, and reliable cake every time. Perfect for a late-night dessert craving!

ingredients.note: 1 egg is too much; 2 tbsp is just right

optional_variations: For a fudgier version, omit the egg.

steps.title: Mix Your Ingredients
instructions: Add all dry ingredients to the mug and mix well.
Add the whisked egg and combine thoroughly. The mixture will become thick and pasty.
Stir in the milk and oil until smooth.
Add chocolate chips and a splash of vanilla or other flavoring. Stir well.

steps.title: Microwave the Cake
instructions: Microwave for 3 minutes in a 1000W oven or 4 minutes in a 700W oven.
The cake will rise over the top of the mug—don’t panic! It will settle once heating stops.

steps.title: Experiment and Customize
instructions: Microwave ovens vary, so you may need to adjust the time slightly.
Try using a little less egg or flour if the texture isn’t ideal.
Keep notes to perfect your own version of this mug cake!

notes: Measure flour carefully to ensure the right texture.
Using chocolate chunks or candy pieces enhances the flavor.
The cake can overflow slightly—use a large mug!
